row1.title: RESPONSIVE DESIGN
row1.description: - Your website will look and function perfectly on any device - from large desktop screens to tablets and smartphones. I carefully design and test each page to ensure it's fully responsive, so your visitors always get the same smooth experience no matter how they browse.

row2.title: FAST LOADING SPEEDS
row2.description: - Speed is everything! A slow website loses visitors before they even see your content. That's why I focus on optimized performance and efficient hosting setups to make sure your site loads instantly and runs reliably.

row3.title: MODERN, CLEAN DESIGN
row3.description: - Every design choice is tailored to your brand and audience. Clean layouts, balanced spacing, and visuals that feel both professional and modern.

row4.title: DOMAIN AND HOSTING GUIDANCE
row4.description: - I'll help you set up your domain and hosting the right way - secure, reliable, and fast. Whether you already have a provider or need help choosing one, I'll walk you through the process so your website is live and running without any confusion.

row5.title: SEO SETUP
row5.description: - Your website will be built with search engines in mind from day one. I'll optimize your structure, metadata, and keyword placement to help you appear on Google and reach more potential customers.

text.row1: Ready to take your business online?

row1.title: Website Maintenance
row1.description: Keep your site fast, secure, and up-to-date with monthly performance checks, content updates, and continuous technical support.

row2.title: SEO Optimization
row2.description: Monthly boost your visibility and ranking on Google with targeted keyword setup, metadata tuning, and site speed optimization.

row3.title: AI Chatbot Integration
row3.description: Add a custom AI-powered chatbot that greets visitors, answers questions, or captures leads - perfect for businesses, clinics, or service providers.

row4.title: Analytics & Tracking
row4.description: I'll set up Google Analytics, visitor tracking, and performance dashboards so you know exactly how your audience interacts with your site - and where you're converting best.

row5.title: Motion & Interaction Design
row5.description: Smooth scroll effects, fade-ins, and subtle animations that make your website feel modern and alive - designed to enhance user engagement and perceived quality.
